channel.title: How do I get others to play my server?
channel.description: I knkow that they have to dl the client, but what must I change so that they can connect? Please explain thouroughly as i am very nooby and will not understand brief explenations.

item.title: How do I get others to play my server?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

In client.java change the 127.0.0.1 to your NO-IP ip.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get others to play my server?

item.title: How do I get others to play my server?
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

You need to change some of the files in the client. In client.java of your client, search for return new Socket(InetAddress.getByName("

Change What’s ever in the ("") to you own WAN IP-Address. To find your WAN IP, go to www.ipchicken.com

Also, in GUI.java, search for: Serverip = " And change what’s ever in the “” to your own WAN IP.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get others to play my server?

item.title: How do I get others to play my server?

item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Have you set your Environmental Variables, Downloaded No-Ip, etc.?
